title: This is my first federal election I'm old enough to vote in, and I back Biden.
selftext:
I was born in 2001, which means I am now past age 18 and now old enough to vote. Last year, I voted Democrats, this year I tend to do it again. 

I am Hispanic and thank Democrats for treating my Hispanic community with respect, Republicans hate me for some reason and all they do is throw dirt on us. I can't ever support Republican ever.
